text:
March 31, 1960
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Mr, Harold A, Engel
Statical WHA
University of Wisconsin
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Harolds
Would you be interested in attending, as an NASB observer, in May (exact
dates not yet set) in Geneva, the meeting of EBU audience research specialists?
See attached, Harold Hill is answering this query as well as he can.
We don’t feel we can pay expenses, since the official representative has
to be a qualified research specialist. But if you’d be interested—-and
feel the experience and contacts would be useful, we shall at one© write
Gilliercn to see if attendance by a non-specialist observer (as I would
be myself if I were there) would be desirable. This would depend on
where you expect to be—-and what dates are. See copy of my attached
letter to him.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skarnia
President
HJStkh
CC» Dr. Keith Engar
Mr. William Harley
Dr. Samuel Becker
Enclosure
